name: Swampgas Shade
description: The Swampgas Shade is a Medium-sized undead with a shadowy, incorporeal form that blends seamlessly into swampy environments, making it a master of stealth and ambush.
memorable: Its ability to drain life and return from death makes it a relentless menace.
goals: To lurk and ambush unsuspecting creatures within its swamp territory.
relations: Commonly found near other undead or swamp creatures, often operating alone.
environment: Swampy areas, often remaining within a one-mile radius of its body.
strengths: Highly dexterous, adept at hiding, and capable of returning to life if slain within its swamp.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, and its powers diminish when outside its bound region.
attacks: Can drain the life force of a target with a melee attack that reduces their Charisma, or cast a psychic ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Rejuvenation allows it to return to life within days unless put to rest properly.
senses: It has a passive Perception of 10 and can use its high Dexterity to excel in stealth.
skills: It possesses a +3 saving throw modifier against Wisdom, making it resistant to mental effects.
additional_information: Amorphous nature allows movement through tight spaces without restriction.
Swamp Camouflage grants it advantage on stealth checks while hiding.
Cannot be revived once its corpse is buried outside the swamp.
Undead nature means it doesn't require food, air, or sleep.
If it leaves its swamp region, it cannot use its Soul Drain ability until it returns.
test_queries: ambush monster that returns after death
